inclusion.criterion: Female or male patients with phototypes I to III and older than 18 years and less than 70 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Indication of aesthetic treatment with CO2 fractional laser in the forehead
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Absence of treatment in the forehead that, at the discretion of the clinical investigator, may interfere with the objectives of the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Absence of allergic skin reactions on the face
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Lack of other significant diseases that, according to the criteria defined in this protocol, may be impacted by the medical criteria, and the evaluations to which it was submitted: clinical history, physical examination, ECG
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Capable of understanding the nature and purpose of the study, including risks and adverse effects, and intending to cooperate with the researcher and to act according to the requirements of the entire study, by signing the Informed Consent Form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: The volunteer has known hypersensitivity to chemically related compounds; history of serious adverse reactions or hypersensitivity to any drug
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known hypersensitivity to lidocaine, prilocaine, vehicle of the investigational product (gel) or to chemically related compounds; history of serious adverse reactions
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of congenital or idiopathic methemoglobinemia
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 31-year-old woman complaining of abdominal pain. She had poor appetite as well as malaise.
